Name: Chikankari Palazzo Set size 12-14 (bust 42")
Description:
Cream chikankari Palazzo set with contrast print dupatta

Full chikankari material with chikankari design border at the hem.

Gold zari hand embroidery on the neckline

Side splits and gold bead detailing on neckline, hem and cuffs

Chikankari front and plain back, on georgette

Back neck tassels

Plain sleeve material provided

Cream Palazzo pants with elasticated waist

Soft dupatta with all over print and clear sequin embellishment. Gold borders and tassels.

Bust size 42 (UK 12-14).

To get the most accurate fit, it is best to measure your bust size in inches (all around at the fullest section).

For any questions about measurements please see our size chart

https://www.shernilondon.com/sizeguide

Name: Splash Tie Dye Print Peplum Lehenga 10-12 (bust 40")
Description:
Light blue multicolour print lehenga

Peplum blouse with gold thread and sequin work on bust front and back.

Small light gold border on peplum.

Sleeve material provided (in the same print).

Lehenga with side zip and hook.

Gold thread and sequin work border with sequin design buttis all over.

Can-can with full lining.

Soft net dupatta with gold disc border detailing and blue border.

Bust 40"

Please ensure you double check the size, bust size is the best way to get an accurate fit.

For any questions about measurements please see our size chart

https://www.shernilondon.com/sizeguide

Name: Mirror & Threadwork Teal Lehenga. 8-10 (bust 38")
Description:
Dark teal blue lehenga with heavy work on the blouse front, silver tassels at the back.

Cap sleeve material provided.

Lehenga skirt with side zip.

Full embroidery with can can and lining.

Soft net dupatta with gold sequin borders.

Bust size 38". Please measure your bust so you get the most accurate fit.

For any questions about measurements or how to measure your bust please see our size chart

https://www.shernilondon.com/sizeguide

Name: Wave Print Lehenga 10-12 (bust 40") and 14-16 (bust 44")
Description:
Pink chiffon wave print lehenga with hand embroidered blouse detailing.

Blouse length - 15"

Cups

Attachable sleeves.

Print back and front.

Can-can (netting is at the bottom of the skirt)

This is a bust size 44"

Please ensure you measure yourself correctly as this will ensure you get the right fit.

For your bust size, measure your bust all around in inches at the fullest part. Allow an inch for ease within the outfit.

You can order a larger size and have it adjusted by your tailor.

If you need any help, get in touch with us using the contact form on the website.

Fully embroidered blouse front with real mirror, stone, cutdana and threadwork.

Plain green back blouse with gold tassels.

Name: Sonam - Yellow
Description:
This vibrant split anarkali top with trousers is perfect for receptions, parties and any other events you need to look effortlessly glamorous for.

Pair with pointed or open toe sandals to give you a beautiful long, sultry silhouette.

 

The anarkali top is fully stitched and lined and can fit up to bust size 44 (it can be taken in by your tailor if necessary)

 

Trouser material is provided and can be made into churidar, normal trousers, or a slim dhoti pant style. The dupatta is fully stitched with borders on all four sides.

More details:
Anarkali - Georgette with full lining front and back
Lining - Silk santoon
Trouser material - Silk Santoon

Dupatta - Georgette with borders on all four sides

Name: Aria - Dark Teal 44"
Description:
The Aria collection features a pure georgette based anarkali which is lightweight and breathable, with gold embroidery along the neckline and borders.

Perfect for your evening events and daytime weddings, these come with material to make a gorgeously well fitted pair of trousers, churidar or slim dhoti pants.

 

Details:

Anarkali - Georgette with light gold embroidery Lining
Santoon Trousers Material - Dull Santoon
Dupatta - Georgette

 

The anarkali is ready made to bust 44-46" but can be taken in by your tailor.

Material for trousers are provided unstitched.

Description:
This lightweight gown is made from georgette fabric which gives you soft lines and a beautiful flow.

 

Mesh back and quilted detailing at the front.

 

Gold embroidery on bodice.

 

 

Sleeves, lycra pyjami and light georgette dupatta included.

Colour may vary slightly from photos due to editing.

Name: Pistachio Georgette Threadwork Embroidered Long Sleeve Gown Size 46 / UK 16-18
Description:
This lightweight gown is made from georgette fabric which gives you soft lines and a beautiful flow. It has all over multicoloured threadwork embroidery, particularly on the yoke with the rounded design.

 

Long sleeves are loosely fitted with embroidered design on the cuffs.

 

The gown has knee-high can-can netting which gives you a flared a-line shape once fluffed out and opened, however you can remove this layer by unstitching it or visiting a reputable tailor.

 

The dupatta has matching blue borders and is made from a soft net.

 

This also comes in a pink variant in bust size 46 (UK 14-16) and light blue in size 44 (12-14) - please use the contact form on the website if you are unable to find these and wish to order.

 

*Please take extra care when selecting your size. Bust measurements are more accurate than UK dress sizing. Bust should be measured at the fullest part, in inches, allowing some room for movement within the garment. If you are unsure of how to measure, please use the 'Contact us' form on the website to get in touch and we will help you.*

 

Colour may vary slightly from photos due to editing.

Name: Burgundy Flared Sharara Set - Size 42 (12-14)
Description:
Unique burgundy georgette sharara suit set with statement dupatta, zig zag white threadwork and sequins throughout.

 

The kameez has a flattering, figure skimming flare and the sharara has elastic at the back and hooks for a comfortable fit.

 

The dupatta comes in a statement, neck-draping style with a band of matching white threadwork material to go in front of your neck - choker style. The soft net then drapes behind you and ends with thin scalloped gold and pearl borders. 

 

This is an ideal design for events where you prefer your dupatta to be more manageable yet look elegant and sophisticated.

 

*Please take extra care when selecting your size. Bust measurements are more accurate than UK dress sizing. Bust should be measured at the fullest part, in inches, allowing some room for movement within the garment. If you are unsure of how to measure, please use the 'Contact us' form on the website to get in touch and we will help you.*

 

Colour may vary slightly from photos due to editing.

Name: Burgundy & Silver Evening Gown - Size 44" (16-18)
Description:
Burgundy and silver georgette gown.

 

High silver embroidery at the base, front and back neckline.

 

The dress comes with matching lycra pyjami and sleeve pieces that can be stitched on.

 

Full length and width georgette dupatta with borders on all four sides.

 

Can-can at the bottom of the dress can be fluffed up for an a-line shape.

Name: Gown with Hand Embellished Neckline 24-26 (bust 54")
Description:
This light green, lightweight gown is sure to turn heads. A perfect mix of western dress and South Asian design with a hand stitched floral motif and neckline, plus a mesh back.

 

The dress comes with matching lycra pyjami, sleeve pieces that can be stitched on, and plain material if you would like to cover the mesh part up.

 

Can-can at the bottom of the dress can be fluffed up for more of an a-line shape.

Name: Black Crop-Top, Trousers & Jacket Set 16-18 (46)
Description:
This trouser crop top set with a long jacket is perfect as Indo-Western wear, at evening events, parties and weddings. 

 

The crop top includes cups (that you can remove), gold and red threadwork motif in the centre, and is sleeveless.

 

Trousers are readymade, with an elasticated waistband at the back, zip and hook fastening to the side.

 

The jacket is lightweight, without lining which allows you to wear the two layers of jacket and top without getting too hot.

 

All are made from silk mix material which is soft but gives the appearance of high-end silk.

 

This does not come with a dupatta.

 

Please take extra care when selecting your size. Bust measurements are more accurate than UK dress sizing. Bust should be measured at the fullest part, in inches, allowing some room for movement within the garment. Name: Peach Palazzo Suit Set. Size 16-18 (bust 46")
Description:
This light peach suit features readymade palazzo pants in a lightweight georgette material. The kameez/top has all over threadwork with clear sequins, long loose fit sleeves and pearl button detailing.

 

The palazzo pants have half an elasticated waistband at the back.

 

The suit features strings and latkans at the back, and has cups however these can be removed easily from the lining material if necessary.

 

The dupatta features peach fabric borders with scattered peach pearls.

 

*Please take extra care when selecting your size. Bust measurements are more accurate than UK dress sizing. Bust should be measured at the fullest part, in inches, allowing some room for movement within the garment. If you are unsure of how to measure, please use the 'Contact us' form on the website to get in touch and we will help you.*

 

Colour may vary slightly from photos due to editing.

Name: Mauve and Gold Floral Gown Size 38"
Description:
Mauve georgette gown with gold and purple floral threadwork embroidery all over. With a matching georgette dupatta and long sleeves. The back has small embroidered flowers and waistband detailing.

 

Bust size 38"

 

Comes with matching lycra pyjami.

 

Fully readymade, lined and stitched.

 

Please ensure your measurement is correct before buying - this outfit is bust size 38".

Name: Dark Peach Soft Silk Gown Size 40
Description:
Dark Peach soft silk gown with gold embroidery on the bodice and threadwork floral motifs scattered all over. With a matching georgette dupatta and attachable sleeves.

Bust size 40"

Comes with matching lycra pyjami.

Fully readymade, lined and stitched. Sleeves will need to be sewn on separately.

If your size is not listed here, please get in touch using the contact us page and we will be happy to advise you.

Bust size 38"

Fully readymade, lined and stitched. Sleeves will need to be sewn on separately.

Name: Navy High Neck Gown 10-12 (bust 40")
Description: Gorgeous navy gown with gold embroidery on the yolk and printed gold design at the bottom, paired with a matching blue dupatta with gold borders and gold all over stones. Available up to bust size 46"Comes with matching blue lycra pyjami and three-quarter sleeves matching the bodice material. Fully readymade, lined and stitched. Sleeves will need to be sewn on separately.If your size is not listed here, please get in touch using the contact us page and we will be happy to advise you or order a customised version.

Name: Two Piece Jacket Gown - Dark Lilac size 16-18 (bust 44")

Two - layer jacket anarkali gown with net overlay and all-over embroidery.

Under the jacket is a full gown with satin bodice and tulle skirt.

The jacket itself has tie ups front and center to accommodate many sizes.

Comes with matching readymade dupatta and net material to add sleeves.

Side zip.

Comes with cups on the dress however these can be removed by unstitching the bust.

Name: Diva Crepe Silk Red Unstitched Suit
Description:
A unique one-off piece in luxurious red crepe silk. The dupatta is made from a matching light georgette red to offset the beaded borders and embroidery on all four sides. 

Perfect for gifting in a bridal trousseau, or for wearing to your next glamorous event. Pair with antique gold jewellery with green accents for a stunning contrast. 

Unstitched suit with sateen lining material for a salwar/pyjami or trousers. This is perfect for gifting, or to have made closer to the time of your events. 

Tailoring services available - price on request. 

Ready to dispatch, UK delivery within 3-5 working days.

Please note some colours may vary slightly from the pictures due to differences and screen resolution and picture editing.

Name: Sonam Beige Salwar Kameez with Gradient Dupatta
Description:
Our Sonam range of limited edition suits is perfect for gifting or for your special events.
Glitzy wide borders make this beautiful paired with a full salwar or pyjami suit. Wear with delicate jewels and accessories for the perfect style combo. 

The unique georgette dupatta is mainly cream, turning to beige at the edges, giving you a two-tone or gradient effect that's sure to catch eyes!

Unstitched suit with lining material for a salwar/pyjami or trousers. This is perfect for gifting, or to have made closer to the time of your events. 

Tailoring services available - price on request. 

Ready to dispatch, UK delivery within 3-5 working days.
